Regulation Name(s): Automated fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH) enumeration system
Specimen Type(s): interphase nuclei from bone marrow transplant recipients
formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded human breast cancer tissue specimens
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ScanView automated FISH enumeration system for cytogenetic, breast cancer, and bladder cancer analysis as an accessory to FDA-cleared devices.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as an automated adjunctive tool for detection, classification, and enumeration of cells in cytogenetic, breast cancer, and bladder cancer specimens, aiding pathologists and cytogeneticists using FISH probe kits and standard diagnostic procedures.
